titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation requiring all seamen and mariners to render themselves to Their Majesties service
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb, printers to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall the twenty seventh day of February 1689/90. In the second year of our reign.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall, London.
